entry.title: False Front
entry.summary:
Author: SavioroftheStars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 144,224Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 407

Summary: Dick Grayson is an undercover agent, tasked with infiltrating the Red Hoods, a dangerous new gang with a strict code of ethics. Posing as Ricky Kelly, a former sex worker with a fabricated past, Dick is sent to gain the trust of their leader, the mysterious and unpredictable Red Hood. As he works his way deeper into the gang, Dick quickly realizes that the Red Hoods are unlike any other criminal organization he’s encountered—disciplined, strategic, and governed by a unique moral code.But things become complicated when Dick finds himself developing feelings for their enigmatic leader and growing closer with the people he was sent to deceive.

entry.title: Dancing with Deceit
entry.summary:
Author: PhantomBoulevard

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,228Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 52

Summary: Jason Todd is recovered from the Lazarus Pit with memories from another life and a myriad of unfathomable abilities. Gabriel should be surprised to find himself reborn as a kid vigilante, but he was not. He’d always been violently leaning and entirely too righteous for others’ peace of mind. Talia al Ghul was expecting a traumatized child she could shape into a murderous pawn for her plans. What she got was a young man too intelligent for her to compete with, too sneaky for her to control, and too powerful to subdue. Ten years after his murder, Jason or Gabriel returns. Mostly written in first-person.  On Hiatus - Being Rewritten (See Last Chapter for Notes).
